**Office Fit-up at the Embassy of Canada to Qatar in Doha**
===========================================================

**Reference:** CB-6896-90369723

**Tender Announcement:**
------------------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for a General Contractor to implement an office fit-up of a newly leased space at the Embassy of Canada to Qatar in Doha. The project involves renovating the office space to accommodate multiple workstations, additional washrooms, a wellness center, business center, kitchenette, and a closed office.

**Tender Type:**
-----------------

This procurement will be carried out through a two-stage process, comprising of a Request for Qualification (RQ) and a Request for Proposal (RFP). The objective of the RQ is to prequalify contractors with the necessary knowledge, skills, and experience in similar projects for participation in the subsequent RFP.

**Tender Details:**
-------------------

*   **Tender Type:** Invitation to Qualify
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Name:** Thomas King
    *   **Email:** realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
    *   **Phone:** 1 343 595-8246
    *   **Address:** 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0G2, Canada
